content: Recovery error. Recovery file not selected.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when a recovery file has not been selected for restoring a portal. It is typically displayed in an error dialog or notification when the user attempts to proceed without selecting a valid file. The exact context may vary depending on the UI component where this key is applied.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ການ​ຟື້ນ​ຕົວ​ຄວາມ​ຜິດ​ພາດ​. ການ​ຟື້ນ​ຕົວ​ໄຟລ​໌​ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ເລືອກ.' is a literal translation and not the most natural way to express the English meaning in Lao. 'ຄວາມ​ຜິດ​ພາດ' (khwit phat) literally means 'mistake' or 'error' and might be too formal or unclear in this context.  A more appropriate translation would focus on conveying the core message: 'There was an error. No recovery file was selected.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to something like: 'ເກີດ​ຂໍ້​ຜິດ​ພາດ​ໃນ​ການ​ຟື້ນ​ຕົວ​. ບໍ່​ໄດ້​ເລືອກ​ໄຟລ​໌​ຟື້ນ​ຕົວ​.' (Koet phit phat nai kan feun tua. Bo dai lueak file feun tua.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation contains two separate sentences.  While grammatically correct, for user interface text, it might be better to combine them into a single, more concise phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Combining the sentences improves readability for a user interface. (See suggestion in 'incorrect_translation' for an example.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'Recuperação' with a capital 'R' in both instances. While 'recuperação' is acceptable, consistency suggests using lowercase 'recuperação' for both occurrences, aligning with common Portuguese usage.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Erro na recuperação. O ficheiro de recuperação não foi selecionado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Eroare la recuperarea' is a literal translation of 'Recovery error' and sounds unnatural in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Eroare de recuperare'.
The word 'ප්‍රතිසාධන' (prathisadhanaya) appears twice. While it's a valid word, consider using a more concise or varied phrasing for improved readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'ආඩු' (aadu) or rephrasing the sentence. Example: 'ආඩු වැරැද්දකි. ප්‍රතිසාධන ගොනුව තෝරා නැත.' (Recovery error. Recovery file not selected.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the repetition of 'ප්‍රතිසාධන' makes the sentence sound slightly awkward.  A more natural phrasing might improve the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase the sentence for better flow.  For example: 'ප්‍රතිසාධනයක වැරැද්දකි. ප්‍රතිසාධන ගොනුව තෝරා නැත.' (A recovery error. Recovery file not selected.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Опоравак грешка. Датотека за опоравак није одабрана.' uses 'опоравак' which is a direct transliteration of 'recovery' and might sound unnatural in Serbian. A more natural phrasing would use a Serbian equivalent for 'recovery' such as 'поврат' or 'обнова'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'recovery' as 'поврат' or 'обнова'. For example, 'Поврат грешка. Датотека за поврат није одабрана.' or 'Обнова грешка. Датотека за обнову није одабрана.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Датотека' is a more formal term for 'file'. A more common and user-friendly term might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more colloquial term like 'фајл' or 'датотечна' (more commonly used in conversational Serbian)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Oporavak' is a direct transliteration of 'Recovery' and while understandable, 'Vraćanje' is a more natural and common Serbian word for 'Recovery' in this context (referring to system recovery).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vraćanje greška. Datoteka za vraćanje nije odabrana.
